Name: Buri Mech Shard
Description: Used for refining gear parts. Increases the success rate of refinement when used, but its effectiveness is limited. Excessive use may pose safety risks, so it should not be overused. It is less valuable than stable Mech Shard products.
Description2$english: A specially processed metal sheet of Bapharian Legacy, it is the crystallization of advanced theories and technologies of heritage experts.

recipes.Name: Buri Mech Shard
recipes.Des: Use Stokes Rich Ore to create Buri Mech Shard for refinement. using it can increase the success rate of refinement but with limited efficiency. Each use of Buri Mech Shard can increase the success rate by up to 10%.

recipes.Name: Buri Mech Shard - Master
recipes.Des: Use Stokes Rich Ore to create Buri Mech Shard for refinement. using it can increase the success rate of refinement but with limited efficiency. Each use of Buri Mech Shard can increase the success rate by up to 10%.

NeedMaterial.Name: Stokes Rich Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After Forging , it can be converted into a larger quantity of special metal "Buri Mech Shard", which is used to increase the success rate of Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
It presents a unique luster, uniform and bright. Interestingly, a single ore sometimes contains multiple metal components. With advanced technology, it can be processed into a rare material.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters, with a higher mineral content than ordinary ores, but the yield is lower, and the price is naturally higher.

NeedMaterial.Name: High-Heat Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder
NeedMaterial.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting than standard one.

recipes.Name: High-Heat Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder ×3
recipes.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting than standard one.

NeedMaterial.Name: Charcoal
NeedMaterial.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

recipes.Name: Charcoal ×10
recipes.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

NeedMaterial.Name: Pine Timber
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipes.Name: Buri Mech Shard- Pro
recipes.Des: Producing Buri Mech Shard with Stokes pure ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. When used in refinement, each Buri Mech Shard offers up to a 10% boost to success rate, offering only modest effectiveness.

NeedMaterial.Name: Stokes Rich Ore
NeedMaterial.Description: After Forging , it can be converted into an even larger quantity of special metal "Buri Mech Shard", which is used to increase the success rate of Refine.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english:
It presents a unique luster, uniform and bright. Interestingly, a single ore sometimes contains multiple metal components. With advanced technology, it can be processed into a rare material.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration. Some concentrated ores will crystallize, with much higher content than ordinary ores, making them very rare.

NeedMaterial.Name: High-Heat Instant-Ignition Carbon Powder
NeedMaterial.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting than standard one.

recipes.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting than standard one.
